person.persName: John P. Gray (Caldwell + Lyon Co. farmer)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Matilda Fowler Gray in Trigg County, Kentucky, on February 6, 1834. Father of Mary B. Gray, James M. Gray, Angeline Gray, Parnecia Gray, Isaac Grey, Charlotte Gray, Adeline Gray, George Gray, Auseline Gray, and M. F. Gray. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Lyon County in 1860.
